name: I'd Never Shoot You!!!!
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −1000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

name: Cloven Rose
effect: [Main] Up to 3 of your Characters gain +1000 power during this turn. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −3000 power during this turn.

name: Munch-Munch Mutation
effect: [Main]/[Counter] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn. Then, up to 1 of your Characters gains +3000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

name: Electrical Luna
effect: [Main] All of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 7 or less will not become active in your opponent's next Refresh Phase.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.

name: Garchu
effect: [Main] You may rest 1 of your {Minks} type Characters: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.

name: We Would Never Sell a Comrade to an Enemy!!!
effect: [Main] You may rest 2 of your Characters: None of your Characters can be K.O.'d by your opponent's effects until the end of your opponent's next turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

name: Thank You...for Loving Me!!
effect: [Main] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" or [Monkey.D.Luffy] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

name: You Can't Take Our King This Early in the Game.
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, reveal 1 card from the top of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" and a cost of 3 or less. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Phoenix Brand
effect: [Main] You may reveal 2 cards with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" from your hand: Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

name: Candy Maiden
effect: [Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, turn all of your Life cards face-down.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: It's to Die For...
effect: [Main] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: Conquest of the Sea
effect: [Main] DON!! −2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} or {Big Mom Pirates} type, K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less.

name: Imperial Flame
effect: [Main]/[Counter] You may place 3 cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

name: Iron Body Fang Flash
effect: [Main] If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Characters gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this turn.

name: People's Dreams Don't Ever End!!
effect: [Counter] Trash 1 card from the top of your deck. If the trashed card has a cost of 6 or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +5000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your trash.

name: Heliceratops
effect: [Main] If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 0.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

name: The Earth Will Not Lose!
effect: [Counter] If your Leader has the {Shandian Warrior} type, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, play up to 1 [Upper Yard] from your hand.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Burn Bazooka
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, you may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand. If you do, add up to 1 {Shandian Warrior} type card from your hand to the top of your Life cards face-up.

name: Burn Blade
effect: [Main] You may trash 1 card from the top of your Life cards: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Add up to 1 card from your hand to the top of your Life cards.

name: It's to Die For...
effect: [Main] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: It's to Die For...
effect: [Main] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
